titleStmt.title: The non-conformists plea for peace impleaded in answer to several late writings of Mr. Baxter and others, pretending to shew reasons for the sinfulness of conformity.
titleStmt.author: Long, Thomas, 1621-1707.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Long--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
